channel.title: (REQ) How to change skill levels by clicking them [Delta]
channel.description: Im looking for a way to make it so i can click a skill, (lets say its 1, and i want it 70). when i click the skill of choice, instead of the average, "quickchat your level is blah blah blah" instead when u click it, in the chatbox it comes up and asks you what level you want to be, and you simply type it in, so you type 70 to get it, can anyone help me with this?
